mbean.name: dcm4chee.xds:service=XDSbRetrieveService
mbean.xmbean:
XDSbRepository Retrieve MBeanService
Provides a XDS.b Repository Retrieve Service.
. org.dcm4chee.xdsb.repository.mbean.XDSbRetrieveService The default constructor XDSbRepositoryRetrieveService List of remote XDS.b Repositories.
Format: <Repository UniqueID>=<RetrieveDocument URI>
Use NONE to disable retrieve from remote repositories. ExternalRepositories java.lang.String Enable/Disable Audit logging of ITI-43 (Report, Retrieve Document Set) log messages. (XDS.b) AuditLogIti43 boolean Enable/Disable Audit logging of ITI-17 (Export, Retrieve Document) log messages.
Select this option when you're using XDS.b Repository in a XDS-I environment where ITI-17 audit logmessages are required. AuditLogIti17 boolean Enable/Disable logging of Request message (Retrieve Document Set Request). LogRequestMessage boolean Enable/Disable logging of Response message (Retrieve Document Set Response). LogResponseMessage boolean Enable/Disable logging of Request message sent to remote repositories (Retrieve Document Set Request). LogRemoteRequestMessages boolean Enable/Disable logging of Response message received from remote repositories (Retrieve Document Set Response). LogRemoteResponseMessage boolean Enable/disable indention of logged XML message. IndentXmlLog boolean Used internally - do NOT modify. DocumentStoreService javax.management.ObjectName &defaultAttributes; &defaultOperations; Retrieve Document Set.
retrieveDocumentSet The RetrieveDocumentSetRequestType Object RetrieveDocumentSetRequestType org.dcm4chee.xds.common.infoset.RetrieveDocumentSetRequestType Repository Unique ID of the local Repository. RepositoryUID java.lang.String org.dcm4chee.xds.common.infoset.RetrieveDocumentSetResponseType
